metadata.title: CVE-2019-6956 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. It is a buffer over-read in ps_mix_phase in libfaad/ps_dec.c. It was discovered that Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 incorrectly handled certain mp4 files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-6956` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

faad - 2.8.8-3.2
libfaad2 - 2.8.8-3.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: faad2 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.8.8-3.2').
